cast.name: 莎巴娜·阿兹米 Shabana Azmi
萨马拉·查卡拉蒂 Samrat Chakrabarti
阿耶莎·达尔克 Ayesha Dharker

introduction: A ruthless philanthropist. A bhangra rapper. An over-protected prodigy. A reckless actress. A lovelorn businessman. An entrepreneurial yogi. And a Loin King. Enter a roller-coaster world of seven strangers whose lives collide during a singing contest in a small New Jersey town.Over three days, in a small New Jersey town, five Indian-Americans and one Jewish Indophile participate in the first DESI IDOL, a Bollywood-style singing contest sponsored by a pork millionaire.These six people are pitted against each other in a singing and dancing extravaganza presided over by the wily contest promoter Sudarsh Bokade, a man with a strong preference for Gipsy Kings music. For seventy-two hours, armed with a song, these seven strangers are going to war. --© Official Site烂番茄小组http://www.douban.com/group/rottentomatoes/
